value.title: Survey: More than half of U.S. adults wary about facial recognition tech in healthcare
value.excerpt: Many adults in the United States are concerned about the use of facial recognition technology in hospitals, medical practices and other healthcare settings, a survey published Thursday by PLOS ONE found.
